Terms and Conditions of Use Privacy Policy
Last updated: 12/01/2024
EventLink (hereinafter “we”, “our”, or “EventLink”), located in Rivera, Rivera, Uruguay, is the owner and operator of the EventLink mobile application (hereinafter, the “App”). We recognize the importance of protecting the privacy of our users and are committed to complying with applicable data protection laws and regulations, including Uruguay\'s Law No. 18.331 on Personal Data Protection, as well as Brazil\'s Law No. 13.709 known as the General Data Protection Law (LGPD).
1. Consent By registering for the EventLink app, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy and give your consent for us to collect, use, and store your personal data and event-related information in the cloud as described in this document.
2. Information We Collect 2.1. Personal Data When registering or using the app, we collect only the data necessary for its operation: First Name Middle Name (optional) Last Name Second Last Name (optional) Date of Birth Gender Identity Document (optional) Email Address Password (encrypted)
2.2. Event Data If you create or interact with events, we collect and store related information, such as: Event Title Description Dates and times Event Address and Geolocation (if applicable) Event Categories Virtual Event URL (if applicable)
This information is stored in the cloud to ensure the proper functioning of the app and its availability to interested users.
2.3. Usage Data To improve the user experience, we locally store data on your device such as: Language preferences Customized settings This data is not stored in the cloud.
3. Use of Information We use the collected information to:
- Provide access and functionality in the app. - Centralize the dissemination and access to events. - Personalize the user experience. - Ensure compliance with terms and conditions.
We will comply with information requests from competent authorities in accordance with the applicable legislation in Uruguay and Brazil, if a judicial order or other legally binding request is received.
4. Storage and Security 4.1. Data Storage Personal and event data are stored on Firebase servers, located in the United States (us-central1 region). Firebase implements high security standards to protect the information.
5. User Rights According to data protection laws, specifically Law No. 18.331 and Law No. 13.709 for Uruguay and Brazil, respectively, you have the right to: - Access your stored personal data. - Rectify any incorrect or outdated information. - Request the deletion of your personal data, provided there is no legal obligation to retain it. To exercise your rights, you may contact us via the email specified at the end of this document.
6. Updates and Changes We reserve the right to periodically update this Privacy Policy. Significant changes will be communicated by publishing an updated version in the app.
7. Contact If you have questions, concerns, or wish to exercise your rights related to this policy, you can contact us at the email address: cassio.fagundez@estudiantes.utec.edu.uy
Thank you for trusting EventLink. We are committed to protecting your privacy.
Sincerely, EventLink Team
